title: Kang Sang-woo
text:
Kang Sang-woo (; <a href="Hanja">Hanja</a>: 姜祥佑; born 7 October 1993) is a South Korean <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who plays for <a href="Pohang%20Steelers">Pohang Steelers</a>.
Club career.
Kang joined <a href="Pohang%20Steelers">Pohang Steelers</a> in 2014 and made his league debut against <a href="Jeju%20United">Jeju United</a> on 5 July 2014.
International career.
Kang was a member of the <a href="South%20Korea%20national%20under-20%20football%20team">South Korea national under-20 team</a> and represented the team at the <a href="2013%20FIFA%20U-20%20World%20Cup">2013 FIFA U-20 World Cup</a>.
He made his debut for <a href="South%20Korea%20national%20football%20team">South Korea national football team</a> on 9 June 2021 in a <a href="2022%20FIFA%20World%20Cup%20qualification%20%E2%80%93%20AFC%20Second%20Round">World Cup qualifier</a> against <a href="Sri%20Lanka%20national%20football%20team">Sri Lanka</a>.
Honours.
International
Individual
